| **Date** | **Sign** |
| Documented pest control programme | Is there a documented pest control program in place, covering all areas of the site? |  |  |  |  |  |  |  |  |
| Is this procedure easily available on the electronic and hard copy format? |  |  |  |  |  |  |  |  |
| Review the header - is it the latest revision, check that the dates and signatures are present on the hard copy Is it a controlled copy? |  |  |  |  |  |  |  |  |
| Training of personnel | Have all staff members undergone training in reporting of any signs and evidence of pest activity to designated manager? |  |  |  |  |  |  |  |  |
| Record compliance | Select a key Records input and verify compliance.  If records are changed after initial recording/entry, are changes clearly legible (errors marked through and initialed); recorded in ink, not pencil? Free of “correction fluid”? |  |  |  |  |  |  |  |  |
| Pest Control service agreement | Is there a pest control service agreement in place and is it specific to the site? |  |  |  |  |  |  |  |  |
| Is the Frequency of Inspections set out in the contract? |  |  |  |  |  |  |  |  |
| Pest control contractor details | Is a list of contact persons and contact numbers available in the case of an emergency? |  |  |  |  |  |  |  |  |
| Pest control Registration details |  |  |  |  |  |  |  |  |
| Public liability Insurance – still valid? |  |  |  |  |  |  |  |  |
| Letter of good standing – still valid? |  |  |  |  |  |  |  |  |
| Competent and fully trained Service technicians | Are service technicians fully trained - technicians licences still valid? |  |  |  |  |  |  |  |  |
| Location of bait stations, traps and electric fly-killing devices | Is Pest control equipment such as bait stations, traps or electric fly-killing devices appropriately located and operational?  Is the location regularly reviewed in the light of any reported pest activity? |  |  |  |  |  |  |  |  |
| Are the bait boxes fixed, numbered and tamper resistant? |  |  |  |  |  |  |  |  |
| Is a detailed, controlled and dated floor map of the site showing numbered locations of all traps, bait stations and electric fly-killing devices, both inside and outside? |  |  |  |  |  |  |  |  |
| Pest control inspections and product used | Are detailed inspection reports available for rodent and EFK units? |  |  |  |  |  |  |  |  |
| Are detailed action reports, in the case of infestation provided? Action taken timeously? Are follow up visits conducted? |  |  |  |  |  |  |  |  |
| Insect light traps are in working order and clean |  |  |  |  |  |  |  |  |
| Is trend analysis conducted on pest activity? At least annually? |  |  |  |  |  |  |  |  |
| Are records of pesticide use that show the type, quantity and concentrations used maintained? Do they show where and how the pesticide is applied, and the target pest? |  |  |  |  |  |  |  |  |
| Are MSDS'e of toxic substances used available in file? |  |  |  |  |  |  |  |  |
| Flying insects control | Is treatment for flying insects controlled to prevent contamination of facility and packaging? |  |  |  |  |  |  |  |  |
| Are the UV tubes of the EFK units fitted with a shatterproof shield? |  |  |  |  |  |  |  |  |
| Are the UV tubes of the EFK units replaced at least annually? |  |  |  |  |  |  |  |  |
| Preventing access | Are buildings maintained in good repair and are holes, drains and other potential pest access points sealed? |  |  |  |  |  |  |  |  |
| Are external doors, windows or ventilation openings close fitting or screened to prevent pest entry? |  |  |  |  |  |  |  |  |
| Pest Management Assessment | Has an in-depth, documented pest management assessment been undertaken at a frequency based on risk, but at least annually, by a pest management expert to review the pest management measures in place . (Includes an in-depth inspection of the site, equipment and facilities for pest activity, review the existing pest management measures in place and make any recommendations for change). |  |  |  |  |  |  |  |  |
